text:
Hey All, 
I wanted to share the most up to date information so people have the facts. To
confirm the VPN and the Patch solutions are separate technologies and code
bases. As a few mentioned the patching technology comes from the Shavlik brand.
The VPN product came from Pulse. Separate code base, separate dev teams, etc. 
Here is the latest update\guidance from CISA:
https://www.cisa.gov/news-events/directives/supplemental-direction-v2-ed-24-01-mitigate-ivanti-connect-secure-and-ivanti-policy-secure
 
and the blog from last Friday discussion the updates:
https://www.ivanti.com/blog/security-update-for-ivanti-connect-secure-and-ivanti-policy-secure-gateways-282024
 
In the blog there is a link to the Ivanti Advisory with FAQs that have answered
questions from Ivanti customers, but if you do have further questions feel free
to reach out and we will help answer questions. 
Regards, 
Chris Goettl 
VP of Product Management, Endpoint Security

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] If not Ivanti, what?
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from chris.goettl@gmail.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Hey All, 
I wanted to share the most up to date information so people have the facts. To
confirm the VPN  and the Patch solutions are separate technologies and code
bases. As a few mentioned the patching technology comes from the Shavlik brand.
The VPN product came from Pulse. Separate code base, separate dev teams, etc. 
Here is the latest update\guidance from CISA:
https://www.cisa.gov/news-events/directives/supplemental-direction-v2-ed-24-01-mitigate-ivanti-connect-secure-and-ivanti-policy-secure
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cisa.gov%2Fnews-events%2Fdirectives%2Fsupplemental-direction-v2-ed-24-01-mitigate-ivanti-connect-secure-and-ivanti-policy-secure&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C9d04cd25d88c4c08d0bb08dc2c251796%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638433785030772273%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=NZ5bbL9muEOeQn7iEX0yyRc7KuPmSuBWc3ZhF1PCttU%3D&reserved=0]

In the blog there is a link to the Ivanti Advisory with FAQs that have answered

Regards,
